Room.Name: North Wall
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached the northern interior iron gate of Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: You may continue around the perimeter of the castle, or take the south hallway to the castle's center court. You would think this place would be deathly quiet, but there's an odd moaning sound drifting through the hallways. Occasionally, it seems to turn into a low cackle.
